channel.title: IVOA Newsletter
channel.description: The IVOA newsletter aims to bring the latest news about Virtual Observatory applications to astronomers by drawing upon developments throughout the international VO community and the national projects linked by the IVOA.
channel.item:
IVOA Newsletter 008 - May 2012 http://www.ivoa.net/newsletter/008/
Weds, 16 May 2012 </item
IVOA Newsletter 007 - October 2011 http://www.ivoa.net/newsletter/007/ IVOA Docs in arXiv/ADS, VAO Iris SED tool, VOIPortal, VOI Android Application, VOPlot1.7, FITSManager Mon, 16 Oct 2011
Issue #6 http://www.ivoa.net/newsletter/006/ Argentina joins IVOA, VODance, TOPCAT Talks TAP, Euro-VO Science Tutorials Weds, 11 May 2011 11:24:00 CEST
Issue #5 http://www.ivoa.net/newsletter/005/ IVOA Science Priorities, CDS Portal, SAMPy, VOSA SED Analyser, WebSampConnector, Aladin 7 4 December 2010 11:24:00 CEST
Issue #4 http://www.ivoa.net/newsletter/004/ Skyalert.org, VOSED: SED Building and Fitting Tool, The GalMer database - simulations of galaxies for observers, China-VO Skymouse Client, SIMBAD Annotations Service Tue, 11 May 2010 11:24:00 CEST
Issue #3 http://www.ivoa.net/newsletter/003/ VO Interoperability in DS9, SPLAT-VO: Spectral Analysis Tool, VirGO - New capabilities for browsing VO resources, ATPy - VOTables in python, Your databases in the VO with Saada Tue, 10 Nov 2009 10:00:00 CET
Issue #2 http://www.ivoa.net/newsletter/002/ VO Applications: US-VO Data Discovery Website, VisIVO Server: Huge Data Exploration, VOPlatform, TOPCAT: Does what you want with tables, JVO On-Line Mosaicing Service, VOSpec version 5.0 Fri, 22 May 2009 11:12:00 CEST
Issue #1 http://www.ivoa.net/newsletter/001/ What is the VO? What is the IVOA? AstroGrid VO Desktop Suite, VirGO v1.3.1, VO-CLI - Command Line Tools for the VO, Large Images in Aladin Fri, 28 Nov 2008 16:57:00 CET
